00007 #ifndef TRAJECTORY_H
00008 #define TRAJECTORY_H
00009 
00010 #include <stdexcept>
00011 
00012 namespace tpk {
00013 
00015 
00026    class Trajectory {
00027       public:
00028          Trajectory() :
00029             Ts(0.0),
00030             T0(0.0),
00031             Order(0) {
00032             Coeffs[0] = 0.0;
00033          };
00034 
00036          Trajectory(
00037             double t,                  
00038             double t0,                 
00039             const double* coeffs,      
00040             unsigned int order         
00041          ) : Ts(t), 
00042             T0(t0),
00043             Order(order) {
00044             if ( Order > maxorder ) {
00045                throw std::out_of_range( "Polynomial order to large" );
00046             }
00047             for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= Order; i++ ) {
00048                Coeffs[i] = coeffs[i];
00049             };
00050          };
00051 
00053          Trajectory (
00054             double p                   
00055          ) : Ts(0.0),
00056             T0(0.0),
00057             Order(0) {
00058             Coeffs[0] = p;
00059          };
00060 
00062          Trajectory (
00063             double t,                  
00064             double p                   
00065          ) : Ts(t),
00066             T0(t),
00067             Order(0) {
00068             Coeffs[0] = p;
00069          };
00070 
00072 
00075          Trajectory (
00076             double t,                  
00077             double dt,                 
00078             double p1,                 
00079             double p2                  
00080          ) : Ts(t), 
00081             T0(t),
00082             Order(1) {
00083             Coeffs[0] = p1;
00084             Coeffs[1] = (p2 - p1) / dt;
00085          };
00086 
00088          Trajectory (
00089             double t,                  
00090             double t0,                 
00091             double dt,                 
00092             unsigned int n,            
00093             double* p                  
00094          ) : Ts(t),
00095             T0(t0),
00096             Order(n - 1) {
00097             if ( n == 1 ) {
00098                Coeffs[2] = 0.0;
00099                Coeffs[1] = 0.0;
00100                Coeffs[0] = p[0];
00101             } else if ( n == 2 ) {
00102                Coeffs[2] = 0.0;
00103                Coeffs[1] = (p[1] - p[0]) / dt;
00104                Coeffs[0] = p[0];
00105             } else if ( n == 3 ) {
00106                Coeffs[2]  = (p[2] - 2.0 * p[1] + p[0]) / (dt * dt) / 2.0;
00107                Coeffs[1] = (4.0 * p[1] - p[2] - 3.0 * p[0]) / dt / 2.0;
00108                Coeffs[0] = p[0];
00109             } else {
00110                Coeffs[2] = 0.0;
00111                Coeffs[1] = 0.0;
00112                Coeffs[0] = 0.0;
00113             }
00114          };
00115          
00117 
00124       Trajectory(
00125          const Trajectory& src,        
00126          double zeropoint,             
00127          double scale                  
00128       ) : Ts(src.Ts),
00129             T0(src.T0),
00130             Order(src.Order) {
00131          Coeffs[0] = ( src.Coeffs[0] - zeropoint ) * scale;
00132          for ( unsigned int i = 1; i < Order + 1; i++ ) {
00133             Coeffs[i] = src.Coeffs[i] * scale;
00134          }
00135       }
00136 
00138 
00141          double sample(
00142             double t,            
00143             unsigned int n = 0   
00144          ) const {
00145             double d = 0.0;
00146             for ( unsigned int i = Order + 1; i > n; i-- ) {
00147                d = d * (t - T0) + Coeffs[i - 1];
00148             }
00149             return d;
00150          };
00151 
00153 
00156          operator double() const {
00157             return sample(Ts,0);
00158          };
00159 
00161 
00164          double timestamp() const {
00165             return Ts;
00166          };
00167 
00168       protected:
00169          static const unsigned int maxorder = 2;   
00170          double Ts;                                
00171          double T0;                                
00172          unsigned int Order;                       
00173          double Coeffs[maxorder+1];                
00174    };
00175 }
00176 #endif
